title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: A Course in Computer NetworksHigh speed WAN technologies â SONET, ATM: basic concepts, switching. Gigabit Ethernet â basic concepts, media access protocols. Wireless networks â wireless communication basics, architecture, mobility management, wireless network protocols, mobile IP; Ad-hoc networks â basic concepts, routing; Bluetooth. Basic concepts of optical networks. Networking internet enabled devices â Jini and UPnP.
